itunes:title: Daniel 1-6 Part 1 • Dr. Lili De Hoyos Anderson • Oct. 31 - Nov. 6
title: Daniel 1-6 Part 1 • Dr. Lili De Hoyos Anderson • Oct. 31 - Nov. 6
description:
Can we take away someone’s agency? Dr. Lili de Hoyos Anderson explores personal revelation and faith amidst trial in the Book of Daniel.

Please rate and review the podcast!

Show Notes (English, French, Spanish, Portuguese): https://followhim.co/old-testament/
